about_the_game:
Welcome to the glamorous life of bounty hunting. As the Last Helion, your job is to take down the galaxy's most wanted fugitives and ultimately uncover those responsible for your species extinction.

Eliminate targets, extract the loot, and upgrade your kit. Rise through the Helion ranks, collect Helion cores and unlock dangerously exciting planets where bigger, badder bounties are waiting. It’s time to prove you're more than a shiny helmet.

Locate & Eliminate

Think of it as hide and seek but with higher stakes, fewer rules, and explosive augments. Missions are rapid and range in difficulty, but completing them will reward you with experience, resources and upgrades. Get in and get out with as much as you can, but make sure you make it to the extraction zone or risk losing that sweet, sweet loot.

Craft & Upgrade

Use loot, materials and the friendly black market vendor to upgrade your weapons and ammo. Experiment with projectiles, incendiaries and much more. A day in the life of a bounty hunter is never dull, you’ll be taking on a variety of enemies from run of the mill mutants to brutish bosses.

Build Your Base & Helion

Use Helion Cores from completed missions to rebuild your ship and unlock new functions and helpful crew. Your experience from missions also allows you to progress and upgrade your talents and skills.

Explore New Worlds

Recon and get the lay of the land to uncover new enemy types and local warring factions. Strategize your weapon loadouts and form alliances to succeed in each new procedurally generated ecosystem.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Hunt dangerous bounties across procedural worlds

  • Master tactical combat against 40+ enemy types

  • Customise weapons with extensive modifications

  • Build and upgrade your command ship

  • Hand crafted procedural worlds and weapons

  • Face 20 legendary boss bounties

  • Challenge yourself in Ironman mode

content_descriptors.notes:
Blood is displayed when shooting enemies
Bodies are left on the ground after death

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Graphics: GTX 680 / AMD HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Last Helion is a roguelike, extraction inspired shooter. Take down wanted fugitives across procedurally generated worlds. Battle warring factions and bosses to secure valuable loot. Craft gear, build your ship, and upgrade your character each run. Death resets the hunt, so kill, earn, die, repeat.
